Description: Blue glazed steatite plaque bearing the cartouches of Amenemhat IV and Prince Ameny in relief. This is not a book-label (as suggested by old display labels and some publications), but the lid of a miniature casket (see bibliography).
Curator's comments: Published : R B Parkinson 'Two or Three Literaray Artefacts' in W V Davies (ed), Studies in Egyptian Antiquities : A Tribute to T G H James (BM Occasional Paper 123 1999), 49-57. PM I Part 2: p.846 Vallogia, RdE 21, p. 120-122.
